Useful hints for WebDAV development
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

:Status: Draft

.. contents::

litmus
======

litmus_ is a WebDAV server test suite based on libneon.

.._litmus: http://www.webdav.org/neon/litmus/
